turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: How many died on Flight 180?  From our group?

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: Thirty-nine.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Remember the gate number?

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Thirty-nine.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Remember the departure time?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Right. April 25th.

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: Wait. I thought you meant the time of your birth. Four/Twenty-five, as in, month and day... that's a reach.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: I'm not just layin' down a bunch of math here, with this. I'm talking about indications... omens... that day, that we were meant to die. That, if, we have been aware of... would have saved everyone on the plane.

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: That's total bullshit. You can find death omens anywhere you want to.

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: I don't understand... did you see Tod die? Did it happen again, like on the plane?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: No, but it might as well be the same thing. This was a message... from someone, or something... hinting... at the design.

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: Alex, on the plane... you must have experienced... some kind of hyper awareness. But here... you're suggesting Tod's death... and maybe our own... will happen because of... an active Presence.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Most kids do, I guess.

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: Most kids never have it happen.

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: Those guys are probably fifteen minutes away.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: No.. I mean, I don't have anything on me. This won't be safe.

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: Nothing is... anymore.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: I can't go home. After Lewton's, they'll be after me.

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: We're takin' you to a cabin in the woods, it's only a couple miles from my house.  Keep off the highways, they'll be lookin' for us.

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: Billy told the F.B.I. he saw you runnin' away from her house.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: They blame me for everything. Her, Tod, the plane crash...

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: Stop the car!

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Let us out!

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: Can't you open the door?!

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Easy, Billy, just open it.

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: Carter, get out!

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Don't do it! Don't do it!

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Get out! Get out of the car!  Get out of the fuckin' car!

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: Get out! Get out of the car!

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: Police are coming.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: That's why It skipped Carter and went to the next one in the path of the explosion; Billy.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: You know what to do.

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: No! No! Don't!

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: When I do this.. it'll have skipped you... and it'll all be over.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I'll remove him.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Fuck you! I'll remove myself!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You're payin' for my trip, Browning!

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: I wish you were on the plane!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hope you don't think, Browning, that because my name ain't on this wall... that I owe you anything.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: I don't.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: All I owe is these people.  To live my life to the fullest.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: We're losing our favorite teacher.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Look, there's something you should all know.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Alright, Browning, you fuckin' warlock... did you know about Ms. Lewton, or what?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Why do you think I was hiding?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Is knowing going to make it easier? It makes it harder.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You get off havin' control over me. Let me choose how to deal with it.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: It doesn't matter who's next... we're all on the same list.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What's your fuckin' worry? If it's not your time...? I could get nailed runnin' this red light and you all wouldn't get shit! Only me, right?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: No!

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: You should have been next. After Lewton, you should've been next. That's the only pattern. You should be dead.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You're the fuckin' devil.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: But I saved him. I intervened. Just like the plane. That's the design.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: My intervention in the death of 180 survivors will cheat the design.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: "Intervention?" What are you, God now?!

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Of course not! Gods aren't afraid to die! Gods don't die! We do!

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Man, that is one George Michael notch from being gay.

turns.speaker: TOD
turns.text: Dude, get wisdom. We're about to board a seven hour flight. The toilets in coach are barely ventilated closets. What if your body wants that airplane food out of your system and you have to go torque a wicked cable and then right after you walks in Christa or Blake?  You want them to associate with you with that reflexive gag and the watery sting in their eyes?

turns.speaker: TOD
turns.text: Fag.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: C'mon, man, like you really thought you were gonna tittie fuck 'em over Greenland, or something?

turns.speaker: TOD
turns.text: Because of you, I gotta sit here and watch fuckin' "Stepmom."

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: And then the cabin banged and the left side exploded. The the whole plane... blew up. It was so real. Exactly how everything goes.

turns.speaker: TOD
turns.text: Been on many planes that blew up, have you?

turns.speaker: TOD
turns.text: Me, too.  But my dad doesn't understand. When he's better; you and me, road trip to the City. Catch the Yanks.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: That's a plan.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: I got this... feeling... a weird feeling... I can't explain it...

turns.speaker: WEINE
turns.text: Did you take any sedatives before boarding, or on the plane. Sleeping pills?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: No. I saw it. I saw it!

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: I believe that... Ms. Lewton's next.

turns.speaker: WEINE
turns.text: "Next?"

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Yes... see, there's this... pattern... that's occuring.

turns.speaker: WEINE
turns.text: Oh, you've noticed it, too?

turns.speaker: WEINE
turns.text: Alex... can you promise me that no one else will die?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: No... I can't. As long as I'm in here, it's outta my control.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: I'm... a friend of his. His best friend. See, his father...

turns.speaker: MR. BLUDWORTH
turns.text: I know who you are.

turns.speaker: MR. BLUDWORTH
turns.text: Cuticle lacerations.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Why would he pull at the wire if he were committing suicide?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: His father's pretty fucked up with denial. Maybe he couldn't deal with the thought of an other accident... taking another son.

turns.speaker: MR. BLUDWORTH
turns.text: In Death...

turns.speaker: MR. BLUDWORTH
turns.text: ... there are no accidents. No coincidencess. No mishaps.  And no... escapes.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: You saying Tod did kill himself?

turns.speaker: MR. BLUDWORTH
turns.text: You may not realize it, but we're all just a mouse that a cat has by its tail. Every single move we make, from the mundane to the monumental... the red light we stop at, or run; the people we have sex with, or won't with us; the airplane we ride, or walk out of... is all a part of Death's sadistic design leading to the grave.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Design?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: I'm sorry we broke in.

turns.speaker: MR. BLUDWORTH
turns.text: No harm. No foul.

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: And don't pass on the right.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Billy! I'm gettin' a vision!  You're the next one...

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: Hey, man, why'd you say that?!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: 'Cause if you say another word, I'm gonna fuckn' kill ya!

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: Please tell me I'm gonna get to see the Jets win the Super Bowl.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Me, right? That's why you're not saying.

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: Shoulda' felt up Tammy in the pool, that time...

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Whatta' you whinin' about? He said I'm next.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: It broke!

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: No one's that strong.

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: What are you doing?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Terry's name should be on this wall.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: So, why'd you want us to meet you here? Now?

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: They're watching me, see if I go to Alex.

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: He didn't say nothin'. Just drive.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You have a responsibility to tell me.

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: Knock it off!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: May as well go out under my own free will, right?

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: Not with us in the fuckin' car!

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: Get control of yourself!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: That's what I'm doin'!

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: I know what you're doing!  It's alright to be scared, Carter. You don't have to prove to us how big your balls are. Not now.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I'm not afraid! I DECIDE WHEN IT'S TIME! I control my life! I control my death!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: SHUT UP, BILLY!

turns.speaker: CLEAR
turns.text: WE DON'T NEED THIS NOW!

turns.speaker: DE FRAVIO
turns.text: You guys are real... aren't you?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Huh?

turns.speaker: DE FRAVIO
turns.text: Sorry, I mean... I talk to people all the time... I know a lot of them aren't there.  But this is real, isn't it?  You're taking me home now?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: That's right, buddy.

turns.speaker: DE FRAVIO
turns.text: I gotta tell you, it's just luck you guys came when you did.  They move us around a lot... We only been at that camp a week.  Got a smoke?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: DE FRAVIO
turns.text: What kind of raggedy-ass rescue you call this?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: You mean the snake?

turns.speaker: DE FRAVIO
turns.text: Yeah.  It's not hard once you get the hang of it.  In the wrist. Anyway, I did what I always do when I get one...

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: What's that?

turns.speaker: DE FRAVIO
turns.text: Put it in the guard's barracks.  Man they got pissed.  They beat the crap out of me, but... it's kind of a tradition.  You oughta see 'em run around.

turns.speaker: DE FRAVIO
turns.text: Wow!

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: What just happened?

turns.speaker: DE FRAVIO
turns.text: Your buddy made it out last night. The place went apeshit.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Really?  How come he didn't take me?

turns.speaker: DE FRAVIO
turns.text: Maybe because you're shot in the leg.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Oh, yeah.  Listen, how long do they keep you in this disease hole?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Hell.  This is just like fucking Star Wars, man!

turns.speaker: DE FRAVIO
turns.text: Star Wars?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: ... and there's this guy with a black helmet and cape, right, and he's got this sword... except it's not a sword, it's light...

turns.speaker: DE FRAVIO
turns.text: There's the Mekong.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: This clown almost blew mission security on the street.  I'm not jumping with him.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Clown?  Now back up there, buddy...

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Ever do this from a jet?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Again.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Insertion.  Call in to base camp by TRANSAT.  Proceed to point Tango November for rendezvous with our ground contact.  Indigenous agent. Co Phuong Bao.  We've been over this three times.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: You stopped.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Co Phuong Bao.  The guide takes us twelve klicks upriver to target at Ban... at Ban... Bo Peep.  Shit!

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Start over.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: ... to target at Ban Kia Na.  We probe the site...

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Ninety.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: ... then proceed downriver to extraction at point Echo Delta. Doyle takes us out by helicopter, we all live happily ever after and that's the last time, Rambo!  I swear to Christ.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: One hundred.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Gettin' old, huh?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Yeah.  Second set.  Let's go.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: No radio source.  Nothing for the bad guys to triangulate on.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Show me how it operates.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: That's what I'm here for.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Show me in case you get zapped as soon as we land.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: We're leaving tonight, not in a week.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Yeah.  Why not?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: You break your leg, I'll have to shoot you.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: You read me, Brewer?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Read you.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Home on my strobe.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: You okay?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Keep it down, man.  I got problems.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: What do you call that?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Modified M-16 A2 and over-under M-79 grenade launcher, with Sionics sound suppressor, Tracor starlight scope and LAC/R-100 Laser sighting system.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Batteries not included.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: This is state-of-the-art firepower.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: What's this?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: AC-System 'Big-Ear' telescopic mike with built-in audio processor. Can pull a whisper out of a loud cocktail party at 50 meters.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Cocktail party.  Uh huh, right.  Let's saddle up.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Where's your stuff?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: That's it?  Some C-4, a map and a knife?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: There's a compass in the handle.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: And a beat-to-shit AK?  Every twelve-year-old in Nam's got one of those.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Exactly.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: You wanna know why I stood up for this show?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: I was in the brig.  They gave me a deal.  I blew up this Colonel's golf cart with an M-19.  He wasn't in it or anything... it was the symbolic value.  Seemed like a good idea at the time.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: That's a real good reason to wind up in 'Nam.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: I've seen worse places.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: There are no worse places.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: This place is a trip.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Buddhist monastery.  Fifteenth century.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Damn!  Leeches.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: You fucking crazy?  I need it to burn these things off.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: No cigarettes.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: I had it cupped.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: What's this stuff on the rice?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Fermented fish sauce.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Why would they send us to a deserted camp?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Who cares?  Let's just do it and get out.  Go have a Jacuzzi and get laid in Bangkok.  Know what I mean?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: We'll check it out.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: How come we didn't just drop near the camp... save this hassle?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Brewer.  Does a jet make noise?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Yeah...

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: What's she saying?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: She likes you.  Says you're dinky- dau.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: What's that?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Powerful warrior.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Yeah.  Dinky-dau, that's me.  Hey, Co.  You wanna meet Jake the one- eyed snake?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: These guys look like they'd sell their mothers.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Sometimes they do.  They're river pirates.  Opium runners.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Pirates?  No kidding?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: How you doing, Brewer?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: I need a vacation.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Snoring.  Five, six guys. Mumbling... Vietnamese.  Somebody talking in his sleep.  A toilet flushing.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Guard barracks.  Take some shots.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: It's a guy in a cage.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: American?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Can't tell.  Pretty tall.  He's real scrunched up in that thing.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Let me see.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Roundeye.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Alright.  Home run.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Torture cage.  Can't stand... can't sit... for days.  Sometimes weeks.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Bastards.  Let's get some shots.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: That guy's not going to make it.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Nothing we can do, man.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: I'm getting him out.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: What?  Are you crazy?  We're supposed to take pictures and split. You're gonna blow the whole program.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: You never been in one of those things.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: I suppose you have...

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: It's orders!  You remember... when they tell you to do something and then you do it.  John Wayne is dead, man.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: You take pictures and split.  I'm going in.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: You better take off.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Ain't you coming with us, sweet thing?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Are they going to torture us?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: What... whattaya do?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Gawd, you look awful.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: You comin'?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Hold your pantyhose.  Here, gimme a hand.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Can you handle the door gun?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: Duck soup.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Brewer!  You know what that thing's packing?

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: It's a Soviet MIL MI-24.  Probably has 12.7mm nose cannon, heat-seeking rockets and wire guided missiles, plus...

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Forget it.

turns.speaker: BREWER
turns.text: You're gonna love it.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: How much we got left in that minigun?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: I'm Rambo.  This is Brewer.  Her name is Co.

turns.speaker: CO
turns.text: It means "virgin."  My mother was comedian.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: You really got a Masters Degree?

turns.speaker: CO
turns.text: Sure.  I only sound like forty-year- old in your language.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: How do we get upriver?

turns.speaker: CO
turns.text: I have arranged transportation.  We meet soon.  But I think you to be disappointed.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Why's that?

turns.speaker: CO
turns.text: I go up to this camp two months ago. Nobody there.  Empty for years.

turns.speaker: CO
turns.text: Where did you find this clown?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: I thought he was with you.

turns.speaker: CO
turns.text: Crazy motherfucker.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: How did you get started working for the spooks?

turns.speaker: CO
turns.text: Spooks?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Intelligence work.

turns.speaker: CO
turns.text: Oh.  They talk to me at university before fall of Saigon.  Make deal.

turns.speaker: CO
turns.text: Nguyen.  He twelve now.  Not see him for eight years.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Where's his father?

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Where's Nguyen now?  What city?

turns.speaker: CO
turns.text: Huntington Beach, California.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: It's nice there.  He's probably digging every minute.  Got a surfboard.  Breaking girls' hearts.

turns.speaker: CO
turns.text: Nguyen is good boy.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Are you okay?

turns.speaker: CO
turns.text: Yes.  But I lose many merits in next life.  Very bad.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Why'd they want us?

turns.speaker: CO
turns.text: They heard about escaped prisoner on radio.  Make deal.  More than we pay.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: CO
turns.text: Rambo.  NVA coming.  Pig dog Kinh say meet them here.  Whole garrison from Con Cuong is out.

turns.speaker: RAMBO
turns.text: Let's go.
